about.title: Predictive, Preventive, Proactive and Multi-level Protection
about.description: Oracle Executive Protection was born from the experience of professionals who have worked for over 30 years in the security sector. Our approach is based on four fundamental principles: prediction, prevention, proactivity and multi-level protection.

prediction.title: Prediction
prediction.description: We anticipate threats before they become real dangers.

prevention.title: Prevention
prevention.description: We implement security measures to prevent incidents.

proactivity.title: Proactivity
proactivity.description: We act promptly to neutralize any risk.

multilevel.title: Multi-level
multilevel.description: We offer protection at different levels of complexity and intensity.

cta.title: Ready to Protect Your World?

items.title: Preventive Security:
items.description: Through meticulous Risk Assessment we analyze risks in a personalized way and mitigate vulnerabilities by implementing the specific measures needed before identified risks become reality.

items.title: Proactive Security:
items.description: We act to anticipate and manage risks before they manifest. We build resilience based on profiling and our experience to anticipate and avoid every possible risk.

items.title: Predictive Security:
items.description: We use analysis based on advanced technologies and intelligence sources. Our Risk Analysts cross-reference AI, OSINT, closint, risk site mapping and deep web information to study possible scenarios, anticipate emerging threats and predict potential risks before they occur.

items.title: Deep Security:
items.description: We have a multi-level security approach to manage each of our clients, their reputation, their assets and proxies by combining physical, IT, organizational security and through constant training to create a resilient system even against the most complex threats.

items.title: Luxury Villas and Residences
items.description: Custom security management solutions for villas, residences and exclusive homes, compliant with international standards, to guarantee serenity and privacy.

items.title: Hotels and Hospitality
items.description: Custom Security Management solutions to guarantee protection and serenity to your VIP guests, compliant with international standards.

items.title: Travel Risk Management
items.description: Personalized protection for business and leisure travel, with global expertise and international standards.

items.title: VIP Events
items.description: Discreet and coordinated security for elite events with specialized protection for VIPs and celebrities, preserving the exclusive atmosphere of the event.

items.title: Corporate, Infrastructure and Sensitive Sites
items.description: Integrated security solutions for companies, critical infrastructure and sensitive sites, compliant with the highest international standards.

items.title: Anti-Terrorism
items.description: Specialized expertise in anti-terrorism with threat analysis, risk assessment and implementation of advanced security measures.

aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.description:
Oracle Executive Protection is a leading company in consulting, analysis and training specialized in the security, defense and physical and technological protection sector.

With over 30 years of experience in the sector, we distinguish ourselves through the excellence of our services and innovative approach to risk management.

contact.title: Need a consultation?
contact.description: Our team of experts is ready to evaluate your specific needs and offer you customized solutions for your security.

home_section.title: Excellence in Global Security
home_section.description:
Founded on experience, driven by innovation: we protect your world with discretion and professionalism, wherever you are.

Oracle Executive Protection is a global reference point in the field of risk analysis and mitigation: a company that deals with Risk Analysis, Security Management, VIP Events, Executive Protection and Counter-terrorism.

Oracle is one of the first global security agencies in Europe to deal with Travel Risk Management, becoming a leader in the sector also thanks to its prestigious national and international partnerships and collaborations.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Over 30+ years of excellence in global security

content.title: Oracle Executive Protection
content.subtitle: Founded on experience, driven by innovation
content.description:
We protect your world with discretion and professionalism, wherever you are.

Oracle Executive Protection is a global reference point in the field of risk analysis and mitigation: a company that deals with Risk Analysis, Security Management, VIP Events, Executive Protection and Counter-terrorism.

Oracle is one of the first global security agencies in Europe to deal with Travel Risk Management, becoming a leader in the sector also thanks to its prestigious national and international partnerships and collaborations.

We are part of an international network of security companies that interact with each other by exchanging information, assignments and services in the Executive Protection sector.

expertise.title: Know-how of over 30 years
expertise.description: Know-how of over 30 years of experience thanks to our team in Security Management, global security operations, Intelligence, Risk Analysis, Executive protection of institutional subjects, infrastructures, sensitive sites, multinational companies, luxury hotels, VIP events and private residences.

technology.title: At the forefront of security
technology.description:
Oracle EP is a company that is not limited to physical security analysis, but is technologically at the forefront.

We use advanced tools such as OSINT analysis, CLOSINT and artificial intelligence, to monitor and predict threats, ensuring predictive and proactive security, Encrypted Communications, Remote Surveillance and UAV, Advanced counter-surveillance systems and Risk Analysis.

Our task is to "Predict the future"! Solving problems when they manifest is already too late.

For this reason the 4 pillars of ORACLE are: Predictive, Preventive, Proactive and Multi-level Security.

Our mission is to ensure the safety of our clients with discretion, innovation and a personalized functional approach.

team.title: Global security professionals
team.description:
Our main strength is absolutely the Team.

Our Team is composed of former Law Enforcement and Military Operators and Global Security Operators. We boast Operators and Analysts with over 30 years of experience in global security operations, specialized in physical protection and management of high-risk contexts, experts in Counter-Terrorism and anti-crime.

We have spent our entire life, our entire career taking care of the security and protection of lives, people, families, companies, sensitive sites, critical infrastructures, borders, states, perimeters that had to be impregnable, places of worship and we have trained some of the best professionals in Security Management, Close Protection and modern Anti-terrorism.

standards.title: Professional security system
standards.description:
Oracle Executive Protection is composed of expert professionals in the key roles of the "Security System": Security Manager, Risk Analyst, Protective Security Specialist, Travel Risk Manager, Anti-terrorism Analysts, Logistics Coordinators, Drivers, Skippers, Cyber Security Operators, UAV pilots.

A team with an unparalleled synergy between prestigious academic certifications and field experience, strategic Intelligence and Cybersecurity.

cta.description: Contact us for a personalized consultation

hero.title: Travel Risk Management
hero.subtitle: Oracle Executive Protection represents one of the most important international realities in Travel Risk Management.

overview.title: Personalized Excellence Service
overview.description:
We offer an excellent service, highly personalized to ensure that every trip of yours: business or vacation, anywhere in the world, is safe, smooth and worry-free.

Our Travel Risk Management service is based on a structured and personalized process. We evaluate every aspect of the trip: destination, itinerary, client profile, using the highest international standards and protocols.

expertise.title: Elite Operational Experience
expertise.description:
Specialized in travel risk management, we combine elite operational experience, advanced intelligence and strategic planning to protect you, your collaborators and your interests, in every context.

We analyze threats, plan safe itineraries and provide real-time support, 24/7.

standards.title: International Standards
standards.description:
Following the highest international standards related to ISO 31030 and 31000. With a discreet but highly effective approach and the use of the most advanced technology and methodologies, our team of experts takes care of every detail: from preventive risk assessment to managing unforeseen events, to physical and technological protection and logistics management.

Our task is to anticipate every possible risk situation and respond to every unforeseen event with unparalleled experience and professionalism. Your peace of mind is our mission.

team_intro.title: Oracle Specialized Team
team_intro.description: Whether it's a business trip or vacation, an entire specialized Oracle team will manage every detail of your stay.

security_board.title: Security Board
security_board.description:
Composed of the Chief Security Manager, our Security Managers, Risk Analysts and our anti-terrorism analysts, the Security Board takes care 24/7 of monitoring every detail of the trip, anticipating every possible inconvenience, communicating with our field operators, following our GPS, monitoring Risk Map sites and Osint analyses in real time.

Create personalized protocols for your trip, the best routes and help you in planning your trip. We monitor in real time and use advanced technologies for tracking, secure communication and threat analysis during the trip.

travel_risk_officer.title: Travel Risk Officer
travel_risk_officer.description:
Our field TROs are professionals with the highest level background. An elite team with over 30 years of experience in anti-terrorism, VIP close protection and intelligence, led by 1st class professionals, experience in the most important international contexts who have also passed complex selections and specialization courses to be at your side.

TROs with maximum discretion and education will be alongside your work team or your family constantly ensuring that every detail of the trip is perfect in order to make your trip worry-free, from environmental and physical clearances of Hotels, Restaurants and Meeting rooms, to the execution of your every movement.

logistics_coordinator.title: Logistics Coordinator
logistics_coordinator.description: Our LCs are our field personnel in charge of logistics planning. They take care of all relations with third parties: restaurants, hotels, meeting rooms, personnel of the places where you will go for work or vacation allowing the client to focus exclusively on the trip whether it is for work or pleasure.

from_abroad.title: From Abroad to Italy
items: We perform physical and environmental clearances of hotels, meeting rooms, restaurants and cars

We pick up our clients at the airport and guarantee them for the entire duration of the trip the best possible Travel Risk Management service in Italy with maximum professionalism, experience and discretion

We analyze possible scenarios through a deep Risk Assessment and risk management and mitigation through the 4 rules of our Agency: Preventive, Proactive, Predictive and Multi-layer security to allow you a trip in maximum safety
We help you in planning and preparing the trip in every detail through our specialized personnel

to_abroad.title: From Italy to Abroad
items: For your business trips anywhere in the world you can count on our services
We prepare every detail of your trip for maximum security through our team of risk and anti-terrorism analysts interfacing if necessary with embassies, consulates and local law enforcement
Our operational team can follow you throughout the trip with the collaboration of our local international partners
We make your work or pleasure trip safe and meticulous in any global scenario
We operate on every continent, with experience in high-risk destinations and luxury contexts

multilevel.description: We provide protection at multiple levels of security and complexity.

surveillance.description: High-definition monitoring systems with facial recognition and behavioral analysis.

hero.title: VIP Events
hero.subtitle: We protect your guests, your event and your reputation with custom security management services for exclusive events.

overview.title: Security Management for Exclusive Events
overview.description:
Whether it's a luxury wedding or a meeting with high-profile personalities, our Security Management service is designed to integrate seamlessly with the exclusivity of your event.

We design customized security protocols, including Risk Assessment and Risk Management, access control, VIP protection, environmental clearances and emergency plans. From physical security to Cybersecurity, we protect every aspect of your event.

expertise.title: Specialized Team and Advanced Technologies
expertise.description:
Our team of professionals will assess every vulnerability of the structure and organization and every possible threat, external and internal, to the success and security of the event.

Our field team, constantly supported by our Security Board, will ensure discreet and unparalleled protection for your VIP event using cutting-edge technologies, such as drones and encrypted communications, for real-time security.

standards.title: Compliance and Quality
standards.subtitle: Each of our security operators is trained to very high standards and accustomed to collaborating with your teams to ensure a smooth experience, keeping security elegant and discreet for guests.

items.title: UNI ISO 31000
items.description: Risk management according to international standards for a scientific approach to security.

items.title: Advanced Training
items.description: Highly specialized team with professional certifications in the security and VIP protection sector.

items.title: Custom Protocols
items.description: We develop tailored procedures for every type of event, from exclusive weddings to corporate summits.

items.title: Innovative Technologies
items.description: We use drones, encrypted communications and advanced monitoring systems for maximum effectiveness.

vip_protection.title: Elite VIP Protection
vip_protection.description:
We can ensure elite protection for VIPs, celebrities and high-profile guests at your event, preserving the exclusive atmosphere of the event.

We design custom solutions for galas, corporate summits, exclusive weddings and luxury events.

antiterrorism.title: Anti-terrorism Competencies
antiterrorism.subtitle: Oracle is one of the most recognized agencies in anti-terrorism thanks to the know-how of its analysts and operators. In high-profile events, our team works exclusively for unparalleled global security.

roles.title: Security Manager
roles.description: Strategic supervision and general coordination of event security operations.

roles.title: Risk Analyst
roles.description: In-depth threat analysis and risk assessment specific to each event.

roles.title: Counter Terrorism Analyst
roles.description: Specialists in preventing and managing terrorist threats and critical situations.

roles.title: Field Operators
roles.description: Highly trained personnel for direct interventions and discreet physical protection.

events.quote: Security is not a luxury, it is a necessity. In our VIP events, excellence in protection blends perfectly with the elegance of the experience.

cta.title: Protect Your VIP Event
cta.subtitle: Contact our experts for personalized consultation on our security management services for exclusive events.

hero.title: Protecting Excellence
hero.description: Oracle Executive Protection specializes in securing luxury facilities with the highest standards of discretion and professionalism. Our elite team protects what matters most to you.

intro.title: Where Luxury Meets Security
intro.description: In the world of luxury, security cannot be left to chance. Our bespoke protection solutions are designed specifically for high-end facilities, combining cutting-edge technology with unparalleled expertise.

expertise.title: 30 Years of Excellence in Luxury Protection
expertise.description: With over three decades of experience in executive protection and luxury security, Oracle Executive Protection has become the trusted partner for discerning clients worldwide. Our proven track record speaks to our commitment to excellence.

services.title: Comprehensive Luxury Security Solutions
services.description: We offer a complete range of services tailored specifically for luxury facilities:

residentialAssessment.title: Complete Analysis of Your Residence
residentialAssessment.description: Our team of professionals will assess the structural vulnerabilities of your residence, environmental risks, external threats and the current state of your active and passive defensive systems.

customSecurity.title: Systems Tailored for You
customSecurity.description: We design your new anti-intrusion system in your home and personalized security protocols, including the most modern security technologies, protection and emergency management. We will deliver written protocols and personalized assets.

familyTraining.title: Our Added Value
familyTraining.description:
We bring you, through our consolidated field experience, the most important thing of all, our added value to everything you could find on the market today: our professionals will work with the family on specific technical training on security protocols to be carried out.

Write to us and request our concierge services and GpG art 133 training.

form.description: Fill out the form below to receive a personalized consultation. Our team of experts will contact you within 24 hours to discuss your security needs.

hero.title: Luxury Security Management
hero.subtitle: Elite security for luxury hotels and private residences. We transform your hotel and protect your family with custom security management services, where security and protection become an attractive strength for VIP clientele, preserving class, elegance and discretion.

introduction.title: A Single Standard of Excellence
introduction.description: Oracle Executive Protection combines experience in protecting prestigious hotel facilities with dedicated care for the most exclusive private residences. From invisible security for your VIP guests to total protection of your family: an integrated approach that guarantees the highest security standards in every luxury context.

riskAssessment.title: Complete Vulnerability Analysis
riskAssessment.description: Through an in-depth Risk Assessment we evaluate all physical, structural and technological vulnerabilities of your hotel, risks for guests, external and internal threats capable of ruining your hotel's reputation and the safety of customers and staff in line with the most important international standards such as UNI ISO 31000, UNI ISO 31030 and Hospitality Security Guidelines.

securitySystems.title: Physical and Digital Protection
securitySystems.description: From active and passive physical security to cybersecurity, we make your facility more resilient and safer. We design customized security protocols and assets and train your staff with certified courses to be ready to respond to any emergency with determination, legal security and experience.

expertTeam.title: Experts at Your Disposal
expertTeam.description: We put our experts at your disposal: including Travel Risk Managers and Travel Risk Officers, Protective Security Specialists, analysts and cybersecurity specialists who ensure discreet and continuous protection to provide you with protection and Travel Risk Management for your most prestigious clients and our exclusive security services for your VIP events.

privateResidences.title: Your Family's Security
privateResidences.quote: There will never be anything more important than the safety of those you love. Make your nest the truly safe place for your family.

residenceAssessment.title: Complete Analysis of Your Residence
residenceAssessment.description: Our team of professionals will assess the structural vulnerabilities of your residence, environmental risks, external threats and the current state of your active and passive defensive systems.

customSecurity.title: Systems Tailored for You

cookies.title: We use cookies to improve your experience
cookies.message: This site uses technical and analytical cookies to provide a better browsing experience. By continuing to browse you accept the use of cookies.

preferences.title: Cookie Preferences
preferences.description: You can customize your cookie preferences below. Enable or disable the following categories and save your selection.

necessary.title: Necessary cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the website by collecting and providing information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging ads.

hero.title: Strategic Protection Against Global Threats
hero.subtitle: Advanced security solutions for Counter-terrorism and Anti-crime for institutions, companies, corporate, public and private infrastructures and sensitive sites, designed to prevent, protect and respond to threats, compliant with the highest international standards.

content.description1: With over 30 years of experience in the security sector, we provide specialized strategic protection services for institutions, companies and critical infrastructures.
content.description2: Our expert teams combine advanced academic skills with field operational experience, ensuring maximum effectiveness in security operations.

overview.title: Oracle Executive Protection Trusted Partner
overview.description:
Oracle Executive Protection is the trusted partner for institutional subjects, international organizations and companies that require advanced protection against threats of political, social or religious terrorism and criminal threats.

With expert teams with over 30 years of experience in global security operations, specialized in physical protection, high-risk context management, crisis management and experts in Counter-Terrorism and anti-crime, with an unparalleled synergy between prestigious academic certifications and field experience, and an important strategic intelligence structure, cybersecurity, we offer integrated security solutions combining our personal experience with the highest international standards in security and anti-terrorism and ensuring global protection and resilience.

certifications.title: International Standards and Certifications
certifications.subtitle: In collaboration with prestigious international partners, we operate in compliance with the most rigorous security and protection protocols, compliant with the highest international standards:

items.title: Advanced Certificate in Terrorism Studies
items.organization: The Handa Centre for the Study of Terrorism and Political Violence and University of St Andrews
items.description: The most important certification on the study and security protocols, defense and anti-terrorism protection.

items.title: ISO 31000
items.description: Provides principles and guidelines to identify, assess and manage risks systematically at a global level.

items.title: UNI ISO 31030
items.organization: Guidelines for business travel risk management
items.description: Focused on the safety and well-being of employees on business trips.

items.title: Hospitality Security Guidelines
items.organization: Security guidelines for the hospitality sector
items.description: Aimed at protecting guests, staff and facilities through preventive and management measures.

items.title: ISO 27002
items.description: Best practices to protect corporate data and systems.

items.title: ISO 27005
items.organization: Standard for risk management in information security
items.description: Provides a structured approach to identify, assess and mitigate risks.

items.title: ISO 22301
items.description: Defines the requirements for planning, implementing and maintaining an emergency response system.

cta.title: Do You Need Strategic Protection?
cta.description: Contact our experts for personalized consultation on our advanced strategic protection services.
